welcome_message_body: Welcome to Payakumbuh, Indonesia! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's picturesque landscapes, rich culture, and delicious cuisine. Take your time to explore and savor all the charm that Payakumbuh has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Martabak Mesir H. Wan
restaurants.description: Martabak Mesir H. Wan is a café located in Payakumbuh.
restaurants.address: Blok Timur Pasar Payakumbuh (Jl. Jend. Sudirman), Payakumbuh, Sumatera Barat

restaurants.name: KFC
restaurants.description: KFC is a fast food restaurant located in Payakumbuh.

restaurants.name: Pondok Sate Danguang-Danguang Asli
restaurants.description: Pondok Sate Danguang-Danguang Asli is a padangnese restaurant located in Payakumbuh.
restaurants.address: Depan Kantor Bupati Lama, Payakumbuh, Sumatera Barat

restaurants.name: Abud's Kebab
restaurants.description: Abud's Kebab is a burger joint located in the city.

restaurants.name: Bofet Pergaulan Baru
restaurants.description: Bofet Pergaulan Baru is a indonesian restaurant located in Payakumbuh.
restaurants.address: Jl. Soekarno Hatta, Parit Rantang, Payakumbuh, Sumatera Barat
